books.title: There Is No Antimemetics Division
books.author: qntm
books.notes: Christmas present to myself! yahii!

books.title: Super Supportive
books.author: Sleyca
books.notes: Really great characters and amazing worldbuilding!

books.title: The Psychology of Money
books.author: Morgan Housel

books.title: Human Compatible: Artificial Intelligence and the Problem of Control
books.author: Stuart Russell

books.title: Orbital
books.author: Samantha Harvey
books.notes: Bought as beach read but I couldn't force myself to finish it

books.title: The Software Engineer's Guidebook: Navigating senior, tech lead, and staff engineer positions at tech companies and startups
books.author: Gergely  Orosz
books.notes: I don't recall finding anything particularly novel. It's a great compendium for someone who needs to hear what's written.

books.title: The Algebra of Wealth: A Simple Formula for Financial Security
books.author: Scott Galloway
books.notes: Building wealth, it kind of changed my attitude towards making money.

books.title: How To Make The Best Coffee At Home
books.author: James Hoffmann
books.notes: He's one of the few youtubers that I really enjoy. It helped me grow out of the "italian way" of drinking (and making) coffee. I'm glad that I kept my mind open.

books.title: Religion for Atheists: A Non-Believer's Guide to the Uses of Religion
books.author: Alain de Botton
books.notes: Started this one, interesting premise about what secular society can learn from religious practices, but it became a bit weird.

books.title: Unsong
books.author: Scott   Alexander
books.notes: What a funny and scholarly book!

books.title: Staff Engineer: Leadership Beyond the Management Track
books.author: Will Larson
books.notes: Essential reading for IC career growth. The archetypes framework is helpful.

books.title: Infinite Jest
books.author: David Foster Wallace
books.notes: About 400 pages in. The Eschaton scene is incredible.

books.title: Crafting Interpreters
books.author: Robert Nystrom
books.notes: Amazing but had to drop it

books.title: Four Thousand Weeks: Time Management for Mortals
books.author: Oliver Burkeman
books.notes: Changed my relationship with productivity. We don't 'have' time, we are time.

books.title: Flowers for Algernon
books.author: Daniel Keyes
books.notes: Emotionally devastating. The writing style evolution is masterful.

books.title: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach (Pearson Series in Artifical Intelligence)
books.author: Stuart Russell
books.notes: Reference book, read selected chapters on search and ML.

books.title: Building Microservices: Designing Fine-Grained Systems
books.author: Sam Newman
books.notes: Solid foundation for distributed systems. Good balance of theory and practice.

books.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
books.author: Martin Kleppmann
books.notes: I had to park it and come back to that after a couple of years. Dense but worth it.

books.title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones
books.author: James Clear
books.notes: The 1% improvement compound effect. Identity-based habits stuck with me.

books.title: Systems Performance: Enterprise and the Cloud
books.author: Brendan Gregg
books.notes: Dense but invaluable reference. The USE method is now part of my debugging toolkit.

books.title: Crystal Society (Crystal Trilogy, #1)
books.author: Max Harms
books.notes: It was instrumental in understanding how an alien AI could think

books.title: A Guide to the Good Life: The Ancient Art of Stoic Joy
books.author: William B. Irvine
books.notes: Foundational

books.title: Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World
books.author: Cal Newport

books.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.notes: Mindblowing back then. Years before the replication crisis.

books.title: Functional and Reactive Domain Modeling
books.author: Debasish Ghosh

books.title: Java Performance: The Definitive Guide: Getting the Most Out of Your Code
books.author: Scott Oaks

books.title: How to Win Friends & Influence People
books.author: Dale Carnegie

books.title: Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion
books.author: Robert B. Cialdini

books.title: Effective Java
books.author: Joshua Bloch

books.title: Three Worlds Collide
books.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

books.title: Dune (Dune #1)
books.author: Frank Herbert

books.title: Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality
books.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

books.title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
books.author: Robert C. Martin

books.title: Superintelligence - Summary: Summary and Analysis of Nick Bostrom's "Superintelligence: Paths, Dangers, Strategies"
books.author: Summary Station

books.title: Rationality: From AI to Zombies
books.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

books.author: Douglas R. Hofstadter
